name: anode production, paste, for aluminium electrolysis | anode, paste, for aluminium electrolysis | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19093/documentation

Industry average of paste anodes for use in the Hall-Héroult process using Söderberg technology.;[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:]

The unit process begins with the unloading of process materials to the storage areas on site.  The operations associated with this unit process include:
* anode mix preparation and anode briquette forming;
* maintenance and repair of plant and equipment; and 
* treatment of process air, liquids and solids.
Treatment of scrubber sludges are excluded, as there is no corresponding waste treatment in the ecoinvent database.

The output of this process is anode paste (briquettes) to be transported to electrolysis plants employing Söderberg technology.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/279:Manufacture of other electrical equipment/2790:Manufacture of other electrical equipment

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data mostly from global surveys by IAI.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The infrastructure input was not covered by the IAI survey and uses the rough guess in ecoinvent 2.2.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Flows are based on a life cycle inventory (LCI) survey and an energy survey carried out by IAI for its member and non member companies. The survey was conducted in 2016 for 2015 data.  Global total percent representativeness is 0.4%,  based on 2015 LCI data, using 2015 production volumes. Data reported from this region reached only 7% of 2015 Soderberg production.  Weighted averages from global reported facilities are adopted.
